Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to manage multiple addresses for accounts in Dynamics 365 Project Operations. This feature will reach general availability on July 11, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature enables you to maintain multiple invoices and delivery addresses along with multiple contact details for customers, vendors, and contracts. This also enables you to use addresses for invoicing purposes.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Manage multiple addresses for accounts learn article.

Title: Dynamics 365 Project Operations - Sync global address book with Project Operations
